author: Michael Palmer

text:
I'm guessing a lot of people are excited for the Switch presentation in less than 3 hours! I know I am. Anyone willing to predict what we will see? I'll start:
-Details on the Switch's rumble feature
-Tons of 3D Mario and BotW info
-Virtual Console talk, including Mother 3 in english
-At least five 3rd party releases, including Skyrim and Dark Souls Collection
-Smash Bros and Mario Kart
-A minigame collection from Nintendo using the Switch's features
-A 299$ price tag and a March 18th release date
